name: Paint Racing
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission - Theme 'Out of Control'

Local co-op

Best played with local co-op! Up to 4 players 

(Gamepad needed for extra players)

Keyboard controls:

-Hold 'W' to go forward
-Use 'A' and 'D' to steer
-Hold 'E' to go out of control!

Gamepad Controls:

-Hold X or A to go forward
-Use left joystick to steer
-Hold Square or X to go out of control!

How to play:

=Paint is splashing all over from the cans in your truck! 

=Race to the finish while splashing as much paint as you can. 

=Make sure to hit all the checkpoints or else the referee won't count that lap! 

=At the end you'll be judged by speed and tiles with your paint color. 

=Your friends might splash over your paint with theirs, so watch out!
